reviews.text: The service is great - right from the doorman to the extremely friendly receptionist and the cheerful guys at the restaurant.
reviews.title: Great Service, Tired Rooms

reviews.text: However the rooms, while clean, are tired-looking and need upgradation - especially the bathrooms. They seem par for the course for a 2-3 star $100 star hotel, rather than the 5 star $250 hotel it tries to be.
reviews.title: Average

likes.disliked: — constant smell of food and cooking

reviews.text: The breakfast was very good though, and my room had no view but was quiet and I had a good sleep.
reviews.title: What a wonderful Hotel

likes.disliked: — The beds took a little getting used to. They seem a little too firm for me.

reviews.text: I think this hotel was earlier positioned as a value hotel, but with hotel prices in Hyderabad shooting up, it elevated itself to a top-rung hotel without the facilities and quality one expects in a hotel in that category.
reviews.title: Taj Deccan is my home from home

likes.disliked: — Am here for another week so let's see.....
